books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: The ninth book in the Outlander series. As the Revolutionary War moves closer to Fraser’s Ridge, Claire and Jamie reunite with their daughter and her family.
books.name: GO TELL THE BEES THAT I AM GONE

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: The second book in the Dragon Heart Legacy series. Breen returns to Talamh as her grandfather Odran plots destruction.
books.name: THE BECOMING

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: The 29th book in the Alex Cross series. Cross fights the mastermind who has stalked him for years.
books.name: FEAR NO EVIL

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The second book in the Whistler series. Investigator Lacy Stoltz goes after a serial killer and closes in on a sitting judge.
books.name: THE JUDGE'S LIST

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Maggie Dawes, a renowned travel photographer, struggles with a medical diagnosis over Christmas.
books.name: THE WISH

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Six women join the Medical Air Evacuation Transport Squadron during World War II.
books.name: FLYING ANGELS

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Mitch Albom
books.description: After a ship explodes, 10 people struggling to survive pull a man who claims to be the Lord out of the sea.
books.name: THE STRANGER IN THE LIFEBOAT

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The fourth book in the Atlee Pine series. Atlee discovers her twin sister survived an abduction at the age of 6.
books.name: MERCY

books.author: by Amor Towles
books.description: Two friends who escaped from a juvenile work farm take Emmett Watson on an unexpected journey to New York City in 1954.
books.name: THE LINCOLN HIGHWAY

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: A death on New Year’s Eve, an unsolved murder and a hunt for serial rapists bring Bosch and Ballard back together.
books.name: THE DARK HOURS

books.author: by Richard Paul Evans
books.description: Richelle writes a book about her estranged and deceased twin sister, Michelle, that is titled “The Prodigal Daughter.”
books.name: THE CHRISTMAS PROMISE

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Hillary Rodham Clinton and Louise Penny
books.description: In the wake of the previous administration’s mishandling of international affairs, the new Secretary of State Ellen Adams confronts interconnected global threats.
books.name: STATE OF TERROR

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Ryland Grace awakes from a long sleep alone and far from home, and the fate of humanity rests on his shoulders.
books.name: PROJECT HAIL MARY
